name: IDC for Uplink Carrier Aggregation
summary: For more information about this feature and related topics, see the following

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.sCellCandidate
parameters.description: The value indicates whether the cell indicated by parameter                                     cellrelation can be used as SCell for UEs                                 using this cell as their PCell.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.earfcnul
parameters.description: The channel number for the central downlink frequency. The mapping                                 from channel number to physical frequency for specified EUTRA bands                                 is described in 3GPP TS 36.104. The values that can be used depend                                 on national, operator-specific frequency allocation as well as on                                 the supported frequency bands in the RBS.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulChannelBandwidth
parameters.description: The uplink channel bandwidth in the cell.

parameters.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
parameters.description: Number of UEs that are IDC-capable.

parameters.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
parameters.description: Number of UEs that are IDC for Uplink Carrier                                     Aggregation-capable.

parameters.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
parameters.description: Number of UEs with disabled uplink caused by                                                                          IDC                                     issues.

parameters.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_INDICATION
parameters.description: Number of times when UL CA is turned on and turned off for each                                     victim system type reason.

parameters.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_INDICATION
parameters.description: This parameter determines if IDC for each victim system type is                                     active or inactive.

parameters.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_ACTIVE_USERS_CHANGE
parameters.description: This parameter determined if In-Device Coexistence is active or                                     inactive for UE.

events.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
events.description: Number of UEs that are IDC-capable.

events.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
events.description: Number of UEs that are IDC for Uplink Carrier                                     Aggregation-capable.

events.name: LOCAL_PER_IDC_USERS
events.description: Number of UEs with disabled uplink caused by                                                                          IDC                                     issues.

events.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_INDICATION
events.description: Number of times when UL CA is turned on and turned off for each                                     victim system type reason.

events.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_INDICATION
events.description: This parameter determines if IDC for each victim system type is                                     active or inactive.

events.name: LOCAL_EVENT_IDC_ACTIVE_USERS_CHANGE
events.description: This parameter determined if In-Device Coexistence is active or                                     inactive for UE.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012264 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012264 MO instance.
